name: SuperCard Project File
summary: Learn about .SC45 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SC45 files are used for developing applications as well as presentations, teaching utilities, and other tools. SuperCard projects can be run using the free SuperCard Player, or they may be built into standalone Mac OS X applications.
NOTE: The extension ".sc45" stands for SuperCard 4.5, the first version to use the SC45 extension. Subsequent versions of the software also use the SC45 extension.

description: Project file created by SuperCard, a high-level visual authoring tool for Mac OS X; stores a data document for the SuperCard runtime and includes user interface components, scripts, and application resources; may contain multiple windows that execute a "stack" in a manner similar to Apple's HyperCard technology.
